text: The men's 4 × 100 metres event at the 2015 Asian Athletics Championships was held on June 4. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |' Chen Shiwei Mo Youxue Su Bingtian Zhang Peimeng Wu Zhiqiang* |' Tang Yik Chun So Chun Hong Ng Ka Fung Tsui Chi Ho |' Wang Wen-Tang Yang Chun-Han Lo Yen-Yao Shen Yu-Sen |} *Athletes who competed in heats only. ==Results== ===Heats=== First 3 in each heat (Q) and 2 best performers (q) advanced to the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
